page.title: 15EPSOM GOLF CLUB
page.content: {The Epsom Downs Golf Club was founded {in 1889 by the Earl of Rosebery. Before this we are not sure what the site was used for, but where the 10th hole is now, some rifle butts were found and we know that a cricket match was played on the Downs in 1880 between the gentlemen of Surrey and Sussex for 150 guineas.{A large part {of the course was also, at one time, {the Upper Cricket Ground of Epsom {College. Today the club has about 750 members and the only foreseen changes are a front and rear extension to the club house. {The golf course is owned by United {Race Courses, the owners of Epsom Race {Course.}The golf club has a few keepers who maintain the golf course but most of it is done by the Downs' keepers.
